channel.title: How do i get it online so others can play?
channel.description: Alright, im running a 508, i portforwarded, i no-ip... i put the no-ip in the client.java for 127.0.0.1, and i have my friends go on moparscape 4.0 and have them go on the 508 webclient on there but it says error connecting to server.... does anybody know how to fix this.?

item.title: How do i get it online so others can play?
item.dc:creator: @l_Atrix_l l Atrix l
item.description:
@l_Atrix_l wrote:

Yup, that and i have my no-ip Duc thing open at all times… with the source’s run.bat when im even on it.

Read full topic
